word: When I returned to Battle Creek there was the Ministerial Institute and the Conference wherein I labored exceedingly hard. Then went to Petoskey to rest, but the college institute was nine miles from Petoskey, at Harbor Springs. Here I labored for five weeks, then returned to Battle Creek and attended the Michigan Conference, and then left [ELLEN WHITE LEFT BATTLE CREEK ON SEPT. 9, 1891. TEN YEARS ELAPSED BEFORE SHE SAW THAT CITY AGAIN.] for Colorado and California.
